pages.title: Galactic Compressor
pages.text: $()Long lost galactic machine and the only available in the known universe of compressing ancient minerals like:$(li)$(4)Melworite Ingot$(li)Firerite Ingot$(li)Morfarite Ingot$()$()$(br)This machine doesn't need energy to work.$(br)Input: 15 ingots => 1 condensed crystal.

pages.text: $()Long lost galactic machine and the only available in the known universe of compressing ancient minerals like:$(li)$(4)Melworite Ingot$(li)Firerite Ingot$(li)Morfarite Ingot$()$()$(br)This machine doesn't need energy to work.$(br)Input: 10 ingots => 1 condensed crystal.
